#summary The title element represents the title of a document.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *title element*

== Usage ==

Most browsers display the `title` element in the titlebar of the browser window, in the browser tab, and in the system taskbar.
